attributes.action: Give all child killers the death sentence
attributes.additional_details: Because anyone who kills a child does not deserve to live.
attributes.background: Anyone who kills or attempts to kill a child should be sentenced to death.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710
